metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, House Of Fun is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: House Of Fun has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major, E Minor,  and A Lydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
